body:
SELECT O.ItemCode, O.WhsCode, O.OnHand, O.Qty_Available, O.Qty_Order, O.OnOrder, O.LastPurPrice FROM FRT_POS.dbo.OITW AS O WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE O.ItemCode = '00587999' AND O.WhsCode = '$makho$'
UPDATE FRT_POS.dbo.OITW SET Qty_Available += Qty_Order, Qty_Order -= Qty_Order WHERE ItemCode = '00587999' AND WhsCode = '$makho$'
